AssociatePatchToManifestJob.name: AssociatePatchToManifestJob
AssociatePatchToManifestJob.description:
Grants permission to associate a patch file with the manifest file to update the manifest
                                                file

DescribeConsoleJob.name: DescribeConsoleJob
DescribeConsoleJob.description: Grants permission to get status of GroundTruthLabeling Jobs

ListDatasetObjects.name: ListDatasetObjects
ListDatasetObjects.description: Grants permission to list dataset objects in a manifest file

RunFilterOrSampleDatasetJob.name: RunFilterOrSampleDatasetJob
RunFilterOrSampleDatasetJob.description:
Grants permission to filter records from a manifest file using S3 select. Get sample
                                                entries based on random sampling

RunGenerateManifestByCrawlingJob.name: RunGenerateManifestByCrawlingJob
RunGenerateManifestByCrawlingJob.description:
Grants permission to list a S3 prefix and create manifest files from objects in that
                                                location
